message.body: A girl just came up to me and said "hi. I don't know if you were the person....this is going to sound rude if you were....sorry to be rude....were you the girl who was just smoking?" I just shook my head and raised my eyebrows. What in the world. Haha. She was sitting next to me for about 20 mins. She didn't even know.
Hahahahaha
Seriously.
So this guy comes up to me and says "are you Vietnamese?".. "No, I'm Korean".. "Are you sure?".. Actually no. I'm a dumpster baby. Wtf lol
HAHAHAHAHAH dumpster baby!
You're funny. You should've said that. Or said "yes I am sure, ordinary person!"
Hahahaha
￼Hahaha. I still think that baby picture is you...but mommy keeps telling me it's me.
￼Definitely my favorite picture
I can't tell haha
I know ahaha you look cray cray
I can't look at that picture without laughing!
I look like I wanna eat someone. Haha
Oh and reminder to you for a remind for chuckles for highlighters
Okay. I text him lol
Hahahaha lord
I'm trying to study these index cards....IM FAILING!!! Haha.
There's so many numbers and charges and elements. THERES TOO MANY. MY BRAIN IS GOING TO EXPLODE. Its a good thing my exam is next Thursday. Haha.
Lol you shouldn't have to memorize all the elements. They should give you a periodic table
Oh no. She does. I mean like...in the poly atomic ions. Like acetate is C2H4O2-0
Ohhh lol
Omg. So my coworker who lost her brother and son has now lost her niece in a freak car accident.
Seriously. Like how much can a woman go through. All this happened in less than a year.
That's seriously insane. She's going to go crazy with grief.
I know! I don't even know how she gets out of bed everyday
Seriously. I don't understand. How could so many awful things happen to one person.
I just saw a girl buy an apple, take 5 bites standing by the trash can, and then threw it out, as if walking and eating an apple is unheard of.
Lol that's insane
Are you going to 7-11? I probably won't be getting to market till closer to 2:10.
No I'm not
Okay. Walking out of yr gallery so I should be there in like 10 mins or so. Is that okay?
Yeppp
